problem.p: You will submit a tar.gz archive file containing your db/migrate/ directory.

To create this archive in a UNIX environment, navigate to the db/ directory and run:
tar czf migrate.tar.gz migrate/
Please make sure that the migrate directory is contained in the archive. For example, unarchiving your submission should create a directory named migrate/ in the current working directory. It should not extract all your migrations directly into the current working directory.
